title: Slow LaTeX Generation
description: LaTeX generation takes 10+ minutes for large datasets with 2000+ tasks. Memory usage grows linearly and eventually causes system slowdown.

attempts.solution: Root Cause: Inefficient string concatenation in template generation loop causing O(n²) complexity. Solution: 1) Replaced string concatenation with list.join() method, 2) Added template fragment caching, 3) Implemented batch processing for large datasets. Testing: Reduced generation time from 10+ minutes to 2 minutes for 2000+ tasks. Prevention: Added performance monitoring and automated benchmarks.

final_solution: Root Cause: Inefficient string concatenation in template generation loop causing O(n²) complexity. Solution: 1) Replaced string concatenation with list.join() method, 2) Added template fragment caching, 3) Implemented batch processing for large datasets. Testing: Reduced generation time from 10+ minutes to 2 minutes for 2000+ tasks. Prevention: Added performance monitoring and automated benchmarks.
